sentences.sContent: His eyes were angry, though he sounded casual.
sentences.sCn: 虽然他的语气满不在乎，但他的眼神充满怒气。

sentences.sContent: Marsha was quite casual about appearing on TV.
sentences.sCn: 玛莎对于上电视很无所谓。

sentences.sContent: She had a casual attitude to life.
sentences.sCn: 她对待生活的态度很随便。

synos.tran: 随便的；非正式的；临时的；偶然的
便装；临时工人；待命士兵

phrases.pCn: 草率性行为；偶暂式性交；随意性交（指随意选择不同对象进行性交活动）

remMethod.val: 平常(usual)可以穿非正式的(casual)服装

trans.tranOther: relaxed and not worried, or seeming not to care about something
